english.segment1: You and the moon are a beautiful sight to me. The stars in your eyes make it really hard to see you. A night in the sun is all I really want. You and me with the best of both for once.
english.segment2: Night breaks. My heart could not ache anymore. Am I that easy to ignore?
english.segment3: You let your song blow right through me. Your mighty intellect makes you mighty hard to see. Will there come a time for me to be more to you, more to me?
english.segment4: Night breaks. My heart could not ache anymore. Am I that easy to ignore?
